title: Set English as default language for all UI content

requirements.text: Change the default language selection to English for all application interfaces, replacing any current default that may be set to Chinese

quotes: 让这款应用默认为英文显示全部内容 包括登陆界面默认为英文登陆界面

acceptanceCriteria: Application loads with English as the default language on first visit
Login interface displays in English by default
All UI text including splash screen, authentication dialogs, and navigation appears in English by default
Language switcher still allows users to manually change to Chinese if desired

requirements.text: Update the language detection logic in useLanguage hook to prioritize English over browser language preferences
acceptanceCriteria: Language hook initializes with 'en' as the default value
Browser language detection is overridden to default to English
localStorage language preference respects user's explicit choice if previously set

requirements.text: Ensure the language selection screen (if shown on first visit) defaults to English as the pre-selected option
acceptanceCriteria: Language selection modal highlights English as the default choice
If LanguageSelection component is rendered, English option appears selected or emphasized

constraints: Do not modify the translation files themselves - only change the default language logic
Preserve the existing language switcher functionality allowing users to change languages
Do not remove support for Chinese languages
nonGoals: Adding new translations or modifying existing translation content
Changing the visual design of language selection components
Removing the language switcher from the header
